review.title: “Great infrastructure and they treat agents fairly.”
review.pros: Pros – The backend of the real estate business - managing transactions from open to close they have down. Great technical support, good website management, good leadership. If you want a real estate firm where they hire experienced agents and let them do their job, then this is the place for you.
review.cons: Cons – As all real estate companies go, executive management is disconnected from day to day life as an agent.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Don't just look at the top producers, pay attention to all agents.
